meta.title: Caillou Misbehaves at Chuck E Cheese's
meta.desc: Caillou throws a really big meltdown when Chuck E Cheese is apparently closed.

ttsdata.text: Let's go home right now before the cops come here. You are in a really heap of deep trouble!
I hate Peter Piper Pizza! I still want to go in Chuck E Cheese's.
Yay! Chuck E Cheese's, here we are!
What the? Hey! It is closed mom and dad!
Well Caillou, it says that they're closed for repairs of rides and games. I'm sorry Caillou.
What? Is this some kind of a joke?
No it is not. Come on, Caillou! Let's go to another play place, like Peter Piper Pizza.
Yeah! That's a great idea! Let's go to Peter Piper Pizza!
Rosie loves Peter Piper Pizza!
But I don't want to go to Peter Piper Pizza.
Why not, Caillou?
Peter Piper Pizza is similarly like Chuck E Cheese's. We can either go to Peter Piper Pizza, or we can go straight home.
No! I still want to go to Chuck E Cheese's, and that's final!
Don't talk to your father like that, Caillou. You better cut it out. You are acting like a spoiled brat.
I have a better idea, mom and dad. How about we break into Chuck E Cheese's, so we can go in.
Come on everyone! Let's break into Chuck E Cheese's and let's go in and have fun in there!
I don't think we can do that. It's against the law.
Okay fine! If you don't want to break in, I will break in Chuck E Cheese's myself!
o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o o Caillou! You no good for nothing! You've just destroyed Chuck E Cheese's.
Mom and dad, can we come back?
No, we cannot. We're going straight home.
Why can't we?
Because you destroyed Chuck E Cheese's.
All I wanted was to go in to Chuck E Cheese's.
Yes, but Chuck E Cheese's was closed, and you threw a big meltdown about it. That was pretty stupid of you to do that.
Stop crying like a baby, Caillou. It's your own fault.
I want to go to Peter Piper Pizza. Can we go there?
No, Caillou. We're still going straight home.
I'm sorry, Mom and dad.
Your apology isn't good enough, so we're home now.
Go to your room and never ever come out!
Let's watch the news while Caillou is in his room.
Good evening, everyone! I'm Tom Broka and welcome to GNN Live News!
We have breaking news today that there has been a destruction at Chuck E Cheese's.
I'm Detective Alan. The police have arrived to investigate and to take a look at the damages of this pizza restaurant Chuck E Cheese's. Thank goodness no one is hurt or killed.
Let's hear what the police and FBI have to say.
The fire is almost completely put out, but we don't know what could possibly be the cause of this.
There are many broken windows and graffiti all over the walls of this perimmisses.
The walls are literally soiled. We have found a rock inside that caused the windows to be broken. We still don't know who could have done it.
This has been GNN live news today. Again, I'm Tom Broka. Thank you for watching!
